short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design web animations with ease. Dive into 3D transformations using mouse control to transform and captivate your creations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Kompositor, the powerful and user-friendly web extension that revolutionizes the way you create animations and visual effects for your web projects. Design and implement stunning motion graphics, digital visual effects, and compositing applications with just a few clicks. From dragging elements to creating nested 3D transformations, Kompositor offers a world of possibilities for web designers and developers.

Features:

a. Effortless animations: Craft engaging animations by simply dragging elements into place. Build visually striking designs without the need for complex coding.

b. Easy HTML element transformations: Quickly and effortlessly transform any HTML element using your mouse. The extension supports both 2D and 3D transformations, allowing you to create truly immersive and dynamic web experiences.

c. Nested transformations: Achieve even more with nested transformations, where transformations sum up from ancestor to child elements. Unlock new creative possibilities for your designs through this advanced feature.

d. SVG elements support: Bring your vector graphics to life with support for SVG elements. Animate and manipulate your SVG designs to create interactive and visually appealing web content.

e. Animate plain JS objects: Go beyond HTML and SVG elements, animating plain JavaScript objects for a flexible and versatile solution to all your animation needs.

GreenSock Animation Platform:

Upon completing your design and animations, export your work to the GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) effortlessly with just one click. Generate GSAP-ready code to seamlessly integrate your stunning animations into your web projects.

Unleash your creativity and transform your web designs with Kompositor. Experience the power of intuitive and dynamic animation creation right at your fingertips.
